title: anuvAvi malai vAsanE
sahitya:
anuvAvi malai vAsanE murugEshanE inimEl en nEsanAi irukka vENum ayyanE


anupallavi

  manamArat-tudi sheidu dinamtOrum ini unnai maravAmal irundiDum mati nAn pera vENum


caraNam    shiram mEl karam kUppi cintai paravashamuravE tirunAmam unadinai karudi varuvEnE
karuNai purindennai kAttaruLavE inda kArtikait-tirunALil tOttarittiDuvEnE
